document_data.name: Night of Another Year
document_data.mainbody: The '''Night of Another Year''' was a holy night observed by worshipers of [[Jergal]], the Lord of the End of Everything.<ref name="PaP-p33" >
document_data.Description: On the last night of the year, [[Nightal 30]], Jergal's [[Scriveners of Doom]] took a break from the endless recording of deaths by reading the names of every death they personally recorded over the past year. The ceremony culminated with the [[priest]]s yelling "One Year Closer" and burning the scroll from which they were reading, signifying that work had begun for the next year.
